name: Flappy Pong (GalaxyDeveloper)
description:
Flappy bird controls on pong paddles, need I say more?

(In early development)

Controls:

Player 1: W to flap

Player 2: Up arrow key to flap

IMPORTANT:

Make sure to play the game in fullscreen, otherwise the screen gets cut off, also if you can't flap make sure to click inside the window to select it :)
